name: 拉斯·林顿
introduction: Russ Linton is a former government agent turned vagabond traveling the US in search of adventure. He attended the University of Oklahoma and graduated in 1997 with a B.A. in Philosophy. He then worked as a graphic artist before landing a job with the Federal Bureau of Investigation in 2002.Russ left government service in 2008 to return to creative pursuits. His writing career began in 2014 with his debut release, Crimson Son, the story of the powerless son of a superhero . A former full member of SFWA, he's recently taken the plunge into the world of thrillers.His body of work spans multiple genres and includes fifteen short stories published across pro and semi-pro venues as well as sixteen novels.
